name: Heath Smith
text: It's been brought to my attention that some from another state or city has posted on our page we have irresponsible, employees and one ran them off the road, to who ever you are Im sorry that has happened to you ,but I received another call last week one of my trucks was blocking a gate at a ace hard ware in Decatur Georgia, reason behind this is we've sold some trucks last year n they ended up in actions, our name logo's and numbers are still on those trucks from what I've been told by few people who's called ,were trying to get the truck owners to remove our lettering we have the tag numbers of the trucks now ,so please remove the negative comment we've worked very hard for lot of years n take pride in this company, to have a bad experience as this said about us ,but I assure no more trucks will be sold with lettering. Thank you to all our loyal customers.i apologize.

text: We have used them for years to work with a large house on campus and found Hughes & Mullenix to be a great partner. When I found out they had called another company, I had the person call Hughes & Mullenix who was able to fix the issue in one visit for the cost of parts and a service call. name: Chris Robinson
text: It was honestly a really great experience from start to finish. My wife met with Cason and we went into wanting multiple options which i thought were all fairly presented and well explained without any pressure of which to go with. I have a close friend who worked for many years for both Trane and Carrier with many of the dealers throughout Birmingham. He gave me a list of 3 companies he would have out to his home personally. Skelton was one of those, another company that i liked very much, and then one we didnt have a great experience on the quote with. Between Skelton and the other competitor, although Skeltons price was higher we were sold by the labor warranty and some of the other written guarantees, along with the rec from our friend. Installation - I believe it was Mark, my wife was the one on site - went way better than i could have imagined. We arranged last minute to have the unit moved to a new location. All of the work was very well done. I had an idea in my head of what "the aftermath" should have looked like and the equipment involved in the move and all that, and i probably would have been satisfied with a lot less. Its obviously a lot of money for most families, so I was bound to have some mix of buyers remorse and hesitation about whether or not we'd gone with the right people However, when i got home and saw the quality of the work, how neatly and efficiently and professionally everything was done, i immediately felt entirely confident in our decision and knew we had some true professionals out at the house. I think its the first time in my life ive spent that much money on something and dont have any regrets or second guessing about who we chose to spend it with. Kudos to both Cason and Mark's teams. Thanks yall!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Our technicians have our customers satisfaction in mind and we are happy they were able to meet your needs!

name: Louis Dina
text: My 15 year old AC unit was recharged about 5 weeks ago. When it stopped working again, I assumed all the Freon leaked out again and that it needed replacement. I asked Skelton’s to give a quote on a replacement unit. Their technician was very thorough and discovered a bad switch and capacitor, which he replaced on the spot. He checked our Freon levels and said they were still perfect. His extra effort and honesty saved us from having to buy a new unit at this time, even though he could have easily convinced me we needed a new unit. (Two other companies also provided quotes on new units, but neither of them discovered the underlying issue.) Honesty and integrity, and a desire to serve the customer’s best interests, are important to me. Skelton’s proved it by their actions. When it is time for a replacement AC system, I’ll call Skelton’s.

name: Jay Miller
text:
My 94 year old Dad's AC system went out on a Thursday afternoon in rural Alabama with the heat index well over 100. Justin promptly called me back and was out to check the system before the end of business that same day. The entire system had to be replaced so it couldnt be resolved that day. Justin lined up Wes and his crew so that they could begin the replacement first thing once the system was delivered. I was told everything would be good to go by 1pm. My Dad and I arrived at 12pm and Wes told me all they needed was access to the thermostat and they would be finished. This group understood the critical situation my Dad was in and went above and beyond to make sure his unit was installed and operating ASAP.
Thank you so much guys...you'll never know how much it meant to my Dad to get back to his home.

name: Doug Tilt
text:
I remodeled a room in my lake house which required repositioning the main intake vent from a vertical in -wall position to an in-floor register.  Brian Skelton , company owner, came out the day after my call, evaluated the job and provided a best guess estimate for the proposed task
The following day a team of two technicians  arrived at 0800 , as agreed. Within 4 hours the old vent box was removed, a new floor frame between the joists was constructed, a new box placed and large duct connected to the existing AC/ Heating unit and new ,sturdy floor grate placed( and thermostat repositioned)

The Skelton team were most professional and efficient.  The job site was completely cleaned and everything double checked to be sure everything was done to my satisfaction and functioning well. An immediate follow up call to me by company owner was appreciated.

The total cost was $960.00 based on labor and materials , which was as expected per initial estimate

My five star rating was completely deserved based on professionalism, punctuality, job done, and charge. I definitely recommend this company and will use them again.

Doug Tilt

This unit was installed in a timely manner. The Sensi Predict allows myself and Affordable Heating and Cooling to monitor various items on my equipment. If anything gets out of line it will alert myself and Affordable Heating and Cooling that something isn't right with the unit. This will help keep small issues that are normally not seen until they cause bigger issues to be taken care of and extend the life of my older (14 year old) HVAC unit. I always recommend Affordable Heating and Cooling to anyone asking for service and support. Thanks again to Scott and his crew.

text: Called these folks the morning after my heat went out in the middle of the night. Explained that I have a disabled child in my home and needed someone to come out and get us up and running. The lady seemed really nice and symapathetic. After taking my name, number, address and email, she assured me someone would call me back in “just a little while” to schedule a time to come out. Never heard back from them at all. I understand if they were unable to help me out. My issue is the lack of communication. I placed several calls to several other companies. All of which at least tried to or told me if they could not help. Affordable Heating & Cooling is the only company that never bothered to call me back. Hats off to D ’n A Heating & Air for going out of their way to help us.

resp.text: We apologize that we missed your call Casey Vinson. Our staff has been working around the clock, so your call was directed to our answering service. We are sorry your call fell through the cracks. Looking over the notes from our answering service we have no recorded mention of a disability call, we try to prioritize no heat calls depending on the severity starting with young children and the elderly. As a company we aim to return calls to all our clients even if we cannot handle their issue to at least direct them to another solution. Once again we are sorry for not being able to return your call during this hectic time and are happy that you were able to solve your issue. Please accept a free maintenance check up on us.  If you would like text me(Scott) personally.  706-332-9880.

name: David Holt
text:
I have two 15 year old Trane heat pumps in my home. I am planning to completely renovate both systems in the next 12 months because I know that equipment like this only lasts 12 to 15 years, even when you keep it professionally maintained like we do.

Unfortunately, one of the compressors died and it makes no sense to repair it but I am not quite ready to invest in the new equipment just yet. I called Affordable and was told they could install a temporary cooling system to get us through the next few weeks while we get our renovation plans and money together.

In less than 4 hours, the Affordable team had the temporary cooling unit up and running! The house is already 3 degrees cooler and feeling great!

I really like that these guys look out for your safety, health, comfort, and lifetime efficiency.

Affordable for life!

name: Alphonso Hicks
text: My system was installed in 2014 by TC. I wasn’t impressed with the old owners, and the way they did business. The new owners are great and the Technicians are so much better than what we’ve seen in the past. Eddie did the maintenance recently and did a great job. Found some issues from the initial install and took care of them at no cost to us. Really appreciate the new owners and staff.

name: Helen Nuelle
text: My air conditioning was not functioning and the company came in checked it out  and made recommendations to correct the problem. Our new system is efficient and it was installed quickly.

name: Earl Cambron
text: Great experience working with Fisher. Would highly recommend Fisher and Total Comfort!

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

name: Ethan Jones
text: Eddie came out to my parents place yesterday. I really appreciate the time he took taking care of their needs and he was very polite and professional. We had some less than happy experiences with this company before the new owners took over, but it looks like they have really turned things around for the better.

name: Scott Williams
text: Total Comfort came out this afternoon.  The technician was Harry. He was very polite and informative. We are getting a new furnace installed on Monday. I would highly recommend Total Comfort to anyone. Thank you so much!! Scott Williams

name: Anne Vicknair
text: After the last service my AC unit wasn’t cooling properly. Called TotalComfort and Eddie came out on a weekend and found the problem and easily corrected it at no charge. Not many companies will stand behind their work like that anymore. Really appreciate the kind and prompt service.

name: Sandra Reaves
text: Gary was very prompt, professional, and efficient.  We really appreciated his courtesy. He quickly got our air conditioner up and running.  In this hot weather, that makes him a super hero to us!!  Thank you so very much!

name: Jason Lane Garrison
text: If you’re looking for a company that’s reliable, professional and do honest work look no more.  I heard Total Comfort Heating was under new management so I was reluctant to call them but did they change my mind when I used them.  Quick to respond, professional and spent the time explaining what was going on with my unit. I’ll definitely use them again.

name: Danny Brown
text: My a/c was not operating correctly so I placed a call to One Source Heating and Cooling and asked for a service man to visit and find the problem.The ladies in the office were very nice and professional and arranged for him to come and access the situation. Sonny   ( the serviceman) arrived right on time and quickly found the problem and had me going in about 10 minutes. He was very professional as well and I certainly will be calling them again for all of my heating and cooling needs. They are the best company for their honesty, punctuality, dependability, professionalism and affordability. I'm so grateful to have them.

name: John Casada
text:
We have two HVAC systems. Total Comfort replaced our first system two years ago. Our second started acting up and we called Total Comfort again.
Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: I’ve dealt with Total Comfort many times from maintenance to repairs and I’ve always been satisfied by their service. Eddy has been out to help us before and always seems to go that extra length to take care of our needs. We really appreciate everyone.

name: FLYBY
text: Had tech arrive, a young and inexperienced boy, explained the issues with the units, the tech did visual inspection only, never hooked up gauges, stated system is working fine. I realized the system was not working, I called 4 times, no one returned my calls, was not allowed to speak to the Manager, Jody, and was told it would be additional charge to come back. Be careful.

name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran
text: Brett Shelton,  my service professional, was very nice and knowledgeable.I find they seem to care a lot about the customers.I would totally recommend them.

name: Holly Chapman
text: Thankful for the New Management for quickly repairing my unit. Professional, on time, and trust worthy. I would choose Total Comfort again and again and you should too!

name: Joe Randall
text: Cody was honest and efficient and took care of my problem. Will definitely call again.

name: Terry Payton
text: Glad they have new owners.  The new ones are terrific!   Took great care of us fast and very fair price.  Thanks again!

name: Stan Paschenko
text: Total Comfort has serviced my Hvac units for the past 3 years. I recommend this company because of their honesty and integrity. No pushy sales pitch.

name: Kelsey
text: I had an emergency call after coming home to an 86 degree house. There's technician was extremely friendly but no resolution was provided. Ther problem he said I had wasn't the problem at all. I missed an entire day of work to be told mid morning the next day noon one could come until afternoon. I could've gone to work in AC for the morning! Very disappointed in the level of service provided.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Just  had total comfort heating and air come to my home and they just installed this new thermostat I could not be more pleased with their work friendly service and the price was just right.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Christy Thomas
text: New owners and management are fantastic!  Good quality customer service!  Very pleased with the work and it was completed in a timely manner.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mike Gillespie
text: Very nice on the phone. Called to let us know the technician was on the way. Technician could not have been more helpful or professional with his explanations and wanting things to be done correctly! Would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Tracie Lewis
text: The tech was very courteous and professional. He and the company went above and beyond. Would highly recommend Total Comfort!

name: Jimmy Owen
text:
Setting the appointment was easy and the agent worked very well to set the appointment which was convenient for me.
The technician was great and explained everything very well.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Blakely Segroves
text: We were so impressed with the new owners!  Prompt and reliable service to repair my unit.  Would highly recommend them!

name: Kandy Kane
text:
Eddie was fantastic!!! Very professional and quick at fixing our problem.
We will only be using this company from now on! If you have any problems with your heating or air, definitely give Total Comfort a call!

name: Julian Kit
text: Called them out after our unit stopped working. The guy who came out only saw $$$, down played our system every chance he could. Said its to small for the house (our house is fairly small and it's always keep us plenty warm). Told us our system had rust which was causing the problem but got it working by taking a piece of wire and cleaning out the sensor. Took less than 2 min to get the system working but cost almost 100$ for next to no work. 18 point inspection is also a lie.

name: Linda Fomby
text: Tyler arrived in a timely manner and solved my problem. Very efficient.

name: Betty Gunter
text: Eddie was at our home yesterday and he’s such a sweetheart. We felt a little silly when he told us why our furnace wasn’t working but we’ll know what to look for next time. Thanks!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Joanne Walker
text: Great Service starting with the operator who took my request for a service call, to the technician who came. Thank you Sonny for being on time, courteous, polite and your very thorough checkup of our heat and air system.

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: James Howlett
text: Eddie came out and took care of our Furnace quickly and gave us a great price for the repair. Will be using this company in the future.

name: Vista Brooks
text: Awesome Company!!! New management that still believes in making sure that mistakes that were made before are fixed. Quick service and a great staff!!!

name: Lillian Wilson
text: They have always been on time and very polite people.I am so glad we used them for our heating and air :)

name: lori krauss
text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

name: Zach Batizy
text:
Was quick and efficient. Helped solve the problem really well

-Sheila Batizy

name: Jay Cardwell
text: Harry did an outstanding job and he was very professional

name: Mora Taylor
text: Sonny was very professional and explained the process very well. I would highly recommend Sonny and Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Terrance Darling
text:
Great job!! Knowledgeable technicians!!! Thanks Harry and Sam.

Mr. Darling

name: B K Gray
text: Worst experience I ever had. Do not, and I repeat do not use this company. Misleading techs, customer service is terrible. Been trying to get a refund, will not return phone calls. I have a service level agreement, and had to buy a new unit from them(which now I don't believe I needed), and they treat you like crap. Everything is about $$$ to them. I agree with Julian

name: Madison Garner
text: They are very unloyal and misleading to their employees! The owner has very bad anger issues and treats people with the upmost disrespect! I wouldn't dare recommend their services not only because of how he does his employees, but by his general characteristic traits. Also the fact that he only hires " attractive young women" ( for office work), is also very disturbing and discriminating. He also doesn't seem to concerned with his customers either. Unless your buying a new unit or signing a service agreement you mean nothing to him.

name: Bryan Blackmon
text: Right Now, Christmas Eve 2014 marks less than 6 months with my new system (old one was 20+ years old and died) from this company. The installation re-used some of the parts from the old system. I have had to call them back out now for the third time in less than 6 months to check on the system and while the people are very friendly, I am highly unsatisfied. A unit of this age (when properly installed) should have zero issues cooling a townhome of my size and should (in general) have no problems. It is now Christmas Eve 2014 and all creatures are stirring because the damned-new HVAC Heat Pump will not cool off my home. Thanks.

name: Lonnie Moore
text: Technician showed up on time, assessed the problem and quickly fixed it. You can’t ask for more than that.

name: Barbie Moore
text: Extremely friendly and fast service 🙂🙂🙂

name: Calvin D Tucker II
text: Service above excellent!

name: Jessica Ray
text: Very professional, excellent customer service.

name: Soleado C
text: Awesome!!!!

name: Joseph Jackson
text: Honest, Experienced, Trustworthy, Timely, and Fair.

name: Joycelyn Oden
text: I had a very good experience with this company! I will be using them again!

name: Carolyn Robards
text: My older Trane A/C motor went out on an extremely hot day. I called that day at noon and they had a technician out before closing. My part was something they didn’t have on hand but they went above and beyond to get it for me as soon as possible. They installed it immediately and everyone I came in contact with was very professional, friendly and explained everything to me. I highly recommend this company!

name: David Pilkington
text: Skelton Heating,Cooling is one of the highest quality Companies you can use for your heating and cooling needs.there Tech's are prompt and courteous.Quickly identifies problems and efficiently solved them.A company with solid footing.You can't beat the value.I would definitely recommend.

name: Melissa Atemon
text: We had gotten an estimate from another company previously and not only were they pricier, but we also had to pay for the estimate. Brian came out and gave us an estimate and explained everything very clearly. The day of install they were early and got to work right away. They did an excellent job and were very professional. I will definitely be using them for our future HVAC needs.

name: Andy
text:
Purchased a brand new Trane A/C system.  They beat the next lowest proposal by $350. On top of the best price,  installation was well done.  Experienced technicians were punctual and did a great job; hauled old equipment away; new, larger pad; everything picked up and cleaned up.  Oh yeah, and the salesman was knowledgeable, courteous and respectful.
Good company.

name: larry lang
text: Top quality service from the ladies in the office , maintenance crew and the installers of my new unit. Job well done in a timely manner.

name: Debbie McCrobie
text: I have been using Skeltons since the owner started his business, working out of 1 van. Brian and his company have serviced my home for years. We also use them where I work and we have no complaints. They are all very nice, and know what they are doing. Starting with Amanda, in the office to all of the service techs,  its one heck of a company. We appreciate all you do for us.

name: Sammie Fowler
text: I recommend Skelton's to everyone.  They have maintained our air conditioners for 5 years now.  They have come out on the weekends when we needed service and we will be calling them to replace our older unit when it comes time.  Great People! Fantastic Service!

name: Matt Blair
text: We've been using Skelton's for years. They are a good family owned business that provides exceptional service. I use them for any HVAC needs at my home and my business. They just recently fixed an attic furnace at my home. Jonathon was professional and courteous. He arrived on time; then he diagnosed and fixed the problem in less than an hour.
